explains: v. 减弱，降低，减少；贬低，轻视

sentences.en: Federalism is intended to diminish the power of the central state.
sentences.cn: 联邦制度旨在削弱中央政府的权力。

sentences.en: In zones of increased turbulence, the planes' wakes will decay more quickly and the effect will diminish.
sentences.cn: 在湍流增强的区域，飞机的尾流会消失得更快，它的效果也会减弱。

sentences.en: Conversely, teachers who have a tendency to "overdirect" can diminish their gifted pupils' learning autonomy.
sentences.cn: 相反，有“过度指导”倾向的教师会削弱天才学生的学习自主性。
